name: Eden (rabbytt)
description:
Welcome to Eden - an abandoned land full of potential. Armed with a strange gun, you have the ability to bring life to this wasteland however you want. 

How are you going to use this power? No rush, you have all the time in the world here.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to aim

Esc to pause

Other controls explained in game

Made under 48 (non-consecutive) hours for Miz Game Jam 1 with the 1-Bit Pack from Kenney.

Source code:  https://github.com/ahorvath12/Eden

08/23/20 (before deadline): fixed minor sprite bug
